comment_text: A better deal in a "free trade agreement" is just that - a free trade agreement. Enforcement and length of IP rights, the ability of corporations to extrajudicially sue governments, GMOs (as is the case in the Trans-Atlantic trade agreement) etc. has nothing to do with free trade, i.e. trade without import taxes.
author: tomp
story_title: Whoever Is Leaking Trans-Pacific Partnership Drafts: Please Leak More
